name: 車振華
objective:
注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。 本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。本課程也會讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being. This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability. This course is also designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name: 洪子晏
objective:
隨著科技不斷進步，人工智慧技術逐漸成熟，無論在生產流程、企業管理及分析決策等方面都陸續開始導入生成式 AI 工具，應用場景橫跨企業營運、數據應用以及產品與服務創新等。本課程將介紹生成式人工智慧原理並結合實作方式，透過實際案例和演練來教授生成式 AI 技術和應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的基礎知識，如深度學習、自然語言處理、圖像處理、推薦系統、預測分析等，並導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例。課程中將結合 Azure OpenAI 雲端服務資源，並以人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域，以培育學生具備領先同儕之人工智慧跨域應用專業能力。
This course introduces the principles of generative artificial intelligence and combines practical exercises regarding the technology and applications of generative AI through real case studies and drills. The course covers fundamental knowledge of AI, such as deep learning, natural language processing, image processing, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and introduces the application cases of AI in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, intelligent manufacturing, among others. The course will also utilize Azure OpenAI cloud service resources and cross-domain application learning mode to cultivate students’ technical abilities in AI cross-domain applications, spanning across data analytics, intelligent computing, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, business forecasting, management, finance, etc., leading them to stand out among their peers.

18	生成式 AI 於製造業之導入應用 II - 遠距教學（洪子晏助理教授）
